bibl.title: A Petrie Papyrus and the Battle of Raphia.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: P. Petrie II, 20, col. IV: text, translation and reconstruction of the course of events. Considers the extraordinary circumstances surrounding the requisitioning: the presence in the harbor of a very special type of boat; the need to deliver a very special type of cargo; the delivery of hay to "the elephants at Memphis"; the imminent outbreak of a battle for Egypt's survival.
